R

release() - Method in class com.thalmic.myo.Hub
Releases any resources associated with this Hub.

After this method is called, Hub.isReleased() will start returning true.
removeListener(DeviceListener) - Method in class com.thalmic.myo.Hub
Remove a previously registered listener.
requestBatteryLevel() - Method in class com.thalmic.myo.Myo
Request the battery level of the Myo.

An onBatteryLevelReceived event will be generated with the value.
requestRssi() - Method in class com.thalmic.myo.Myo
Request the RSSI of the Myo.

An onRssi event will likely be generated with the value of the RSSI.
rotate(Quaternion, Vector3) - Static method in class com.thalmic.myo.Quaternion
Return a copy of this vec rotated by quat.
rotate(Vector3, Vector3) - Static method in class com.thalmic.myo.Quaternion
Return a quaternion that represents a rotation from vector from to to.

See http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1171849/finding-quaternion-representing-the-rotation-from-one-vector-to-another for some explanation.
run(int) - Method in class com.thalmic.myo.Hub
Run the event loop for the specified duration (in milliseconds).

During that time, this method will block.
runOnce(int) - Method in class com.thalmic.myo.Hub
Run the event loop until a single event occurs, or the specified duration (in milliseconds) has elapsed.

During that time, this method will block.
